entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
